biocontainers.name: minnow
biocontainers.summary: A principled framework for rapid simulation of dscRNA-seq data at the read level

biotools.summary: A principled framework for rapid simulation of dscRNA-seq data at the read level | Minnow ( read level simulator for dscRNA-seq data) | Most analysis pipelines validate their results using known marker genes (which are not widely available for all types of analysis) and by using simulated data from gene-count-level simulators

bioschemas.name: minnow
bioschemas.summary: A principled framework for rapid simulation of dscRNA-seq data at the read level | Minnow ( read level simulator for dscRNA-seq data) | Most analysis pipelines validate their results using known marker genes (which are not widely available for all types of analysis) and by using simulated data from gene-count-level simulators
